objects.specification: A sturdy classroom floor surface with realistic texture mimicking polished hardwood planks, colored in warm earthy tones. The material has subtle sheen and slight imperfections such as grain lines and knots to enhance realism. A normal map provides depth detail and gentle reflections.

A flat indoor wall panel with a smooth plaster surface painted in a muted earthy green. The wall features crisp edges and subtle surface imperfections such as tiny cracks and paint irregularities, with realistic shading to mimic a real classroom interior wall.

A simple indoor ceiling panel with a smooth white plaster surface featuring subtle texture and realistic lighting response. The ceiling includes natural slight imperfections and gentle reflectivity to mimic a real classroom ceiling.

A large teacher's desk with sturdy wooden construction and rich brown finish. The desk features a smooth rectangular tabletop, inset drawers on one side with metal handles, and slightly rounded corner edges. A visible wood grain texture and subtle wear on the edges enhance authenticity.

A large rectangular chalkboard surface with matte black finish, enclosed in a wooden frame. The board shows faint chalk residue marks and slight surface scratches, while the wood frame has visible grain texture in a dark brown tone.
A standard student desk featuring a simple rectangular wooden tabletop and tubular metal legs, finished in warm brown tones. The surface shows visible wood grain and slight edge wear for realism.

A large realistic dinosaur exhibit statue crafted with detailed skin scales and muscular anatomy. The pose is dynamic and imposing, featuring earthy green and brown tone textures with subtle color variations. Normal mapping enhances skin detail, and the surface uses appropriate roughness to evoke a prehistoric display.

A detailed dinosaur skeleton fossil replica featuring articulated vertebrae and limb bones. The bones have an off-white to beige coloration with slight weathering, fine surface cracks, and porosity detail. The model appears as a museum-quality anatomical display.

A tall wooden bookshelf with multiple shelves for dinosaur books and educational materials. The frame is constructed from dark brown wood with visible grain texture and subtle imperfections. The shelves have slight bevel edges and sturdy vertical supports.

A wall-mounted analog clock with a circular face, clear numerical markers, and two hands. The clock has a plastic frame in a neutral shade, a glass cover with slight reflectivity, and a simple modern design.

A potted plant with lush green fronds in a simple terracotta pot. The leaves vary in shape and size with realistic textures and subtle color gradients. The pot shows a clay texture with slight surface imperfections.

A large rectangular window with a transparent glass pane and thin white metal frame. The glass uses a clear shader with slight reflection and refraction, while the frame shows a subtle metal texture.
A pair of draped fabric curtains in an earthy green tone. The curtains feature gentle folds, realistic cloth simulation, subtle sheen, and visible stitch details along the edges.

A small cylindrical waste bin made from dark grey plastic with smooth curved sides. The bin is slightly tapered towards the bottom and features an open top. The surface has a matte finish with fine emboss details.
